name: Blasting Beam
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You channel a powerful beam on the target, who must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d6 arcane damage, halved on a success.

The beam remains until the start of your next turn, still between you and the target. If no creatures or objects are between you and your target at the start of your next turn, they take 3d6 arcane damage.
empower: The beam deals 2d6 arcane damage to creatures that pass through it or start their turn inside.
